meanings.definition: A video game where players can explore, build, and fight in a 2D world.
meanings.sent1: In Terraria, you can create your own virtual world and go on exciting adventures.
meanings.sent2: My brother loves playing Terraria on his computer every evening.
meanings.sent3: The characters in Terraria must be very brave to face all the challenges in the game.
meanings.sent4: Playing Terraria is like diving into a colorful, pixelated universe full of surprises.
meanings.sent5: After playing Terraria, I feel like I've been on a thrilling journey without leaving my room.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'terrarium', a container for plants or small animals.
meanings.sent1: I have two terraria in my room, one for my succulents and one for my pet frog.
meanings.sent2: The terraria on the windowsill are filled with beautiful flowers and tiny creatures.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks the terraria are her personal jungle gym, much to the plants' dismay.
meanings.sent4: The terraria in the science classroom are like miniature ecosystems, teeming with life.
meanings.sent5: The terraria in the botanical garden showcase a stunning variety of plant species.
